General.Name: Eng Kah Corporation Bhd
General.Description: Eng Kah Corporation Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the manufacture and sale of cosmetics, skin care, perfume, household, toiletry, and personal care products in Malaysia, the United States, and Australia. The company operates through Personal Care, Household, and Others segments. It offers skin care products, such as cleaning, and moisturizing and treatment products; personal care products comprising oral care, body care, and hair care products; color cosmetics, which include lip care, foundation, nail, cheek, and eye products; and home care products, including laundry care, kitchen care, bathroom, floor cleaner, air freshener, pet care, shoe care, auto care, and personal protection products. The company is also involved in the marketing and distribution of aromatherapy souvenir collections. It also exports its products to China, Hong Kong, Indonesia, Taiwan, Thailand, Myanmar, and Singapore. The company was founded in 1967 and is based in Bayan Lepas, Malaysia.
